ygData.subject: Re: Bardic Guide on EQLizer
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh My! I went and read JC s bard guide after i heard about it here.  Could he have been a little more inaccurate?  My personal guess is that (if he played one
ygData.messageBody:
Oh My!

I went and read JC's bard guide after i heard about it here. Could he have
been a little more inaccurate? My personal guess is that (if he played one at
all) he played it up to maybe level 7. Some of my friends and i have exchanged
e-mail with JC before, and he has consistently been misinformed, wrong, etc on
many issues, and refused to accept any evidence to the contrary. He doesn't
even know what Lullaby does! That's just amazing.

Anyway, i had posted on friday asking if anyone knew where the Runed Lava
Pendant was dropped.....i found out....after obligatory spoiler space.
:
:
:
:
:
:
:
:
:
:
:
:
:
:
The Runed Lava Pendant is (a very good item for bards) AC5, +6STR, +5 Fire
Resist. I cannot confirm, but it is dropped in Sol A, off of the Lava
Elemental.


Still looking for info on the Granite Bracer.....

Kaleid
17th Song
Prexus
===
"Thou shall not kill. Thou shall not commit
adultery. Don't eat pork."
I'm sorry, what was that last one? Don't eat pork? God has spoken. Is that the word of God or is that pigs trying to out smart everybody?"
-- Jon Stewart
